sentences.en: A new process in powder metallurgy materials - shock compaction has been summarized.
sentences.cn: 介绍了一种新的粉末冶金材料制备工艺 ——— 冲击成形.

sentences.en: Although warped by compaction, there is only stight folding of the sandstone lenses.
sentences.cn: 虽然由于压实作用而弯曲, 但砂岩体褶皱很轻微.

sentences.en: Due to the single output, the best compaction ratio can Awl - compactor.
sentences.cn: 由于该电路是单输出的, 所以总能保证最大压缩率.

sentences.en: In many sedimentary basins the salinity of the formation water increases with depth or compaction.
sentences.cn: 在许多沉积盆地中,地层水的含盐量随深度或压实作用而增高.

sentences.en: Its compaction equipment in the world are in a leading position.
sentences.cn: 其压实设备在国际上处于领先地位.

sentences.en: Large - scale consolidation and compaction of soil were responsible for a major part of the destruction.
sentences.cn: 大部分破坏都是由于土壤的大规模固结和压密所造成的.

sentences.en: Large-scale consolidation and compaction of soil were responsible for  the destruction.
sentences.cn: 大部分破坏都是由于土壤的大规模固结和压密所造成的。

sentences.en: Regular forking of beds and borders relieves the compaction caused by rain.
sentences.cn: 时常翻动一下花圃和草坪四周会让被雨水压紧的土壤松动松动。

sentences.en: Sand fill and compaction are essential factors of successful EPC.
sentences.cn: 干砂的充填及紧实是实型铸造工艺技术中的关键要素.

sentences.en: Sedimentation embodies the processes of evosion, entrainment, transportation , deposition , and compaction of sediment.
sentences.cn: 泥沙问题包括泥沙的侵蚀 、 挟带 、 输移 、 淤泥和密度的过程.

sentences.en: So the void ratio method is feasible in compaction control of subbase.
sentences.cn: 因此,路基压实用空隙率法控制是切实可行的.

sentences.en: Soil compaction may limit horizontal root extension.
sentences.cn: 土壤的紧密度能限制水平根的扩展.

sentences.en: The residual porosity indicates the compaction state of the formations.
sentences.cn: 而剩余孔隙度又反映了地层的压实状态.

sentences.en: The study on compaction standard of highway subgrade has important meaning.
sentences.cn: 这对于我国的高速公路路基压实标准的修订具有重要的参考价值.

sentences.en: This is an indication of the compaction of employed membranes.
sentences.cn: 这说明了实验用膜具有一定的可压缩性.
